reviewText: These songs are wonderful,sung by wonderful people, Love Bill and been to his concerts, met Vestel and Howard twice and wonderful people
This is the best Christmas Dvd Singing that we have ever seen.......me and my Mommy and Daddy love it......please make more like this one............

This adds so much to the celebration of the true Christmas. There are songs I have known, and songs I didn't know, but all add richly to the true meaning of Christmas. The testimonials are so inspirational.
Always great when you get a gaither DVD. I love the music. When I got it i put it on and it was great
I enjoyed this as much as Nashville homecomeing again I missed the old faces but the new ones are up to a high standed...Ray

There were no problems with the order and the used DVD was in very good condition as promised. I love all the Gaither Homecoming DVDs. We had a video of this one but wanted it in DVD format. Their Christmas music always helps me get into the Christmas spirit!

Glad to have this ... but you can tell that it was one of the early videos (1995-96 I believe) ... was not as smoothly produced as most all of the later ones ... still good and worth having ... and this second-hand video is in excellent shape!!
Good music is hard to find.

Over the years I have watched and listened to a lot of the Gaither Homecoming series. Joy to the World  has become a Christmas tradition at our house.

The selections on this program include some favorite Christmas Classic Carols as well as some more contemporary numbers. Interesting testimonies are interspersed between some of the musical numbers which add another dimension to the presentation.

My favorite numbers include those backed up by the Christ Church Choir of with Janet Pascal, and Mark Lowrys Mary Did You Know?

Memorable  inspiring  great family entertainment !

Note: This VHS is also available as a DVD.
Extremely happy with everything.  Thank you.
Great Item - Love It - Would recommend highly.
